original: Larsson, Erik Valdemar, rektor, Älmhult, f. 28/5/94 i Svenljunga, Älvsb. 1., av disp. Hans L, o. Johanna Christensson. G. 28 m. Karin Andersson. Barn: Karin f. 31, Elsa 39, Hans-Erik 41. — Stud:ex. i Malmö 13, fil. mag. i Lund 17, provår v. Gbgs h. real 29, Lär, v, Malmö tekn. elem:sk. 18, e. o. lär. i Klippan 21, Strömsnäsbruk 21-23’, e, o. ämneslär. o. rektor v. Älm-liults h. folksk. 23-24, ord. ämneslär, i tyska, eng. o, franska där 25, dito samt rektor 27, adj, i ^samma ämnen o. rektor v. Älmbults samrealsk. sed. 44. Ordf. i fastigh :ndn, hälsov :ndn, Möckelns turisttrafikfören. o. Älm-iiults försköningsfören., v, ordf. i komm:fullm, o, dess beredn:utsk. m, fl. komm. uppdrag. Stud :resor t. Tyskl., Österr., Holl., Belg., Frankr. o. Ital. RVO.
translated: Larsson, Erik Valdemar, principal, Älmhult, born 28/5/94 in Svenljunga, Älvsb. 1, to parents Hans L. and Johanna Christensson. Married on 28 with Karin Andersson. Children: Karin born in 31, Elsa in 39, Hans-Erik in 41. - Studied: completed high school in Malmö in 13, obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in Lund in 17, interned at Gothenburg's high school for real studies in 29, taught at Malmö Technical Elementary School in 18, acting teacher in Klippan in 21, Strömsnäsbruk in 21-23, acting subject and principal at Älmhult's primary school in 23-24, regular subject teacher in German, English, and French there in 25, same positions and principal in 27, assistant teacher in the same subjects and principal at Älmhult's secondary school since 44. Chairperson of the property board, health board, Möckeln's tourism traffic association, and Älmhult's beautification association, vice-chairperson of the municipal council and its preparatory committee, and other municipal assignments. Study trips to Germany, Austria, the Netherlands, Belgium, France, and Italy. Recipient of the Royal Order of the Vasa (RVO).

education.awardingInstitution: Gothenburg's High School for Real Studies
